The service includes 12 industry-tailored agent solutions to help businesses build and deploy AI agents. Nvidia also published a post on its blog outlining the partnership with Accenture and KION Group to optimize supply chains. Accenture's stock has underperformed the S&P 500 over the last year, rising just 7% compared to the index's 26% gain. The company appears poised to capitalize on opportunities in warehousing and industrial automation, with Nvidia's CEO stating that Accenture and KION can accelerate the development of industrial AI and autonomy.
